entry.string: SUCCESS
FAILURE
CAUTION
System Settings Check

For Xaraya to function properly, the installer must write your database information to the file #(1). If your settings are not correct, this script will not be able to do so. The installer needs write access for steps 3 and 4 only.
PHP Version is greater than or equal to 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is #(1)
PHP Version is less than 4.1.2. Your PHP Version is #(1) please upgrade PHP.
Xaraya needs a MINIMUM of 8 Megabyte of PHP memory (16M or higher STRONGLY recommended). The current memory limit is #(1).
Xaraya needs a MINIMUM of 8 Megabyte of PHP memory. ( 16M or higher STRONGLY recommended) The current memory limit is #(1).
entry.translation: Xaraya 需要最小 8M 的 PHP 内存 (强烈推荐使用 16M 或更高的内存)。当前内存限制是 #(1)。

entry.string: Especially if you are planning to install modules during the install phase, a lot of memory is required. When in doubt, do a core only install and install modules manually later.
entry.translation: 特别是如果您计划在安装过程中安装模块，需要更多的内存。如果您害怕内存不够，可先仅安装内核，晚些时候再自己安装模块。

entry.string: The installer can write to the configuration file.
entry.translation: 安装程序能写入配置文件。

entry.string: The installer cannot write to the configuration file. Please verify that your webserver has write access to the file #(1)
The installer can write to the directory #(1)
The installer cannot write to the directory #(1). Please verify that your webserver has write access to the directory #(2)
The installer cannot write to the #(1). Please verify that your webserver has write access to the directory #(2)
Locales Settings Check
For translation to function properly, Xaraya must have write access to files in the locales directory
Xaraya can write to the directory #(1) and all its files and subdirectories.
Xaraya cannot write to the directory #(1) and all its files and subdirectories.
Please verify that your webserver has write access to the files under the directory: #(1)
Write access is required to cache language text for locales other than en. If you're not sure, ignore this warning.
This write access is only needed if you intend on using translations module at your site actively.
entry.translation: 些权限仅在您想要使用翻译模块的时候需要。

entry.string: Information on Loaded PHP Extensions
These extensions may be required for some modules to work, however Xaraya is not dependant on these extensions for installation. Refer to #(1) for further information on these extensions.
The XML Extension is loaded.
The XML Extension is not loaded.
The MySQL Extension is loaded.
The MySQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
entry.translation: MySQL扩展未装载，Xaraya需要PGSQL或者MySQL扩展来运行。

entry.string: The PGSQL Extension is loaded.
The PGSQL Extension is not loaded. Xaraya will need either the PGSQL or MySQL extension to be loaded to proceed.
entry.translation: PGSQL扩展未装载，Xaraya需要PGSQL或者MySQL扩展来运行。

entry.string: The XSLT Extension is loaded.
The XSLT Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the XSLT transform module at this time.
entry.translation: XSLT扩展未装载，此扩展仅在使用XSLT转换模组时才需要。

entry.string: The LDAP Extension is loaded.
The LDAP Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed if you intend on using LDAP authentication with the Xaraya LDAP Modules.
entry.translation: LDAP扩展未装载，此扩展仅在你想使用Xaraya的LDAP模组进行LDAP验证时才需要。

entry.string: The GD Extension is loaded.
The GD Extension is not loaded. This extension is only needed for the images module at this time for resizing of thumbnails.
entry.translation: GD扩展未装载，此扩展仅在图片模组创建缩略图时才需要。

entry.string: Check Again
